sentences.en: A labourer paints at a stadium construction site in Yingtan, central China's Jiangxi province.
sentences.cn: 中国江西省, 一名工人正在空中粉刷一处露天体育场建筑物.

sentences.en: But does wage - labour create any property for the labourer?
sentences.cn: 但是,难道雇佣劳动,无产者的劳动,会给无产者创造出财产来 吗 ?

sentences.en: Distress everywhere inclines the labourer to listen with eagerness to agitators.
sentences.cn: 遍地的贫困会使工人如饥似渴地倾听煽动者讲话.

sentences.en: He got a job as a builder's labourer.
sentences.cn: 他找到了一份建筑工人的工作.

sentences.en: He has worked as a labourer in factories and on building sites.
sentences.cn: 他在工厂和建筑工地干过苦工。

sentences.en: He tired many ways of earning a living, in the end he became a farm labourer.
sentences.cn: 他尝试了许多谋生的方式, 最后他做了农场工人.

sentences.en: He tried many ways of earning, in the end he became a farm labourer.
sentences.cn: 他试过许多谋生之道, 最后他做了农场工人.

sentences.en: I have lived in a farm labourer's cottage.
If any labourer refuses to work, Fatima says they face brutal recriminations.
sentences.cn: Fatima说,如果有人拒绝工人, 他们将面临残酷的惩罚.

sentences.en: Jerry: Well, what does he do? Is he an artisan , a craftsman, labourer of some sort?
sentences.cn: 杰瑞: 那他是干啥的? 艺术家 、 手艺人,还是民工?

sentences.en: Jim is a casual labourer, he can't find a proper job anywhere.
sentences.cn: 吉姆是个临时工, 他到处找不到正式工作.

sentences.en: Labor law is not labourer rights law but the law which should regulate integrated relations.
sentences.cn: 劳动法应该是调整上述关系的综合性的法律而不是劳动者权益保护法.

sentences.en: Salute to the labourer who sticks to working position as before during the Spring Festival!
sentences.cn: 向春节期间依然坚守工作岗位的劳动者致敬!

sentences.en: That new labourer is not very strong and I doubt if he'll stay the course.
sentences.cn: 那位新工人不太强壮,因而我怀疑他是否能坚持到底.

sentences.en: The labourer hardly [ scarcely ] deserves his wages.
sentences.cn: 这个工人几乎不配领取他那份工资.

words.tran_cn: 吃力的；费劲的；不自然的
英国劳工工党党员；工党党员
工作；劳动；分娩（labor的过去分词）
劳动；努力；为…所苦恼；艰难地行进（labour的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: （尤指户外的）体力劳动者，劳工，工人
trans.tran_en: someone whose work needs physical strength, for example building work
